<div id="ftr">
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div id="pn" style="text-align: center"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">F-15</font></div>
</div>
<div id="pb" style="text-align: center; page-break-after: always; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 6px; width: 100%; height: 1px; background-color: #000000">
<!--page break--></div>
<div id="hdr">
<div style="text-align: left; width: 100%; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 13px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="text-decoration: underline; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">
Litigation</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">The
Company is not a party to any litigation and is not aware of any
pending litigation or unasserted claims or assessments as of
December 31, 2020.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="text-decoration: underline; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">
Officer Compensation</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">On
January 1, 2021, the Company entered into new employment contracts
with Stephen T Chen, the Company&#x2019;s Chairman, CEO, President,
and CFO; and with Bernard Cohen, the Company&#x2019;s Vice-President
of Administration. These new contracts replace the previous
contracts which expired on December 31, 2020. The new contracts
began January 1, 2021, and extend through March 31, 2021, at which
time each contract expires. The job descriptions, duties, titles,
benefits, and compensation amounts are identical or proportionate
to the expired employment agreements. Compensation for Dr. Chen is
set at $20,000 per month (an annual rate of $240,000) in cash,
payable bi-monthly, and $8,333.33 monthly (an annual rate of
$100,000) payable in shares of the Company&#x2019;s unregistered,
voting common stock. Compensation for Mr. Cohen is set at $70,000
per annum in $5,833.33 cash payable bi-monthly (based on the annual
amount of $70,000), and $1,000 payable monthly (annualized at
$12,000), payable in shares of the Company&#x2019;s unregistered,
voting common stock.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">The
contracts provide that the Employee shall devote his entire
productive time, ability, attention and energies to the business of
the Company. In addition, the contracts protect the property rights
of the Company, including inventions and other intellectual
property, trade secrets, and proprietary information. The contracts
also prohibit Employees from competing directly or indirectly with
the business of the Company or its controlled subsidiaries, both
during the term of the contracts, and continuing for a
period.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-weight: bold; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">
12. Subsequent Events</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">On
January 1, 2021, the Company issued Note #10.21 for deferred
compensation to Dr. Stephen T. Chen, Chairman, CEO, President, and
CFO, in the amount of $54,150, the maximum amount of cash
compensation that could be deferred for 2021. The Note is payable
on April 1, 2021, and bears interest at the AFR<font style="font-size: 70%; vertical-align: top">14</font> short-term rate of
1.85%. The note is an advancing note with a maximum limit of
$54,150 whereby the Company promises to repay the aggregate
Principal Amount advanced to date up to the stated maximum amount
at Maturity. The Company may request and the payee shall advance up
to $9,025 on the 15th and last day of each month until the note
matures. The Note may be convertible in whole or in part at a
conversion price of $0.25 per share into Amarillo Biosciences,
Inc., Common voting stock. All shares issued are to be restricted
subject to Rule 144 promulgated under the U.S. Securities Act of
1933. The Company may prepay the Note in whole or in part at any
time without penalty.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">On
January 1, 2021, the Company issued Note #11.21 for deferred
compensation to i2China Management Group, LLC in the amount of
$33,000, the maximum amount of cash compensation that could be
deferred in 2021. The Note is payable on April 1, 2021, and bears
interest at the AFR<font style="font-size: 70%; vertical-align: top">15</font> short-term rate of
1.85%. The note is an advancing note with a maximum limit of
$33,000 whereby the Company promises to repay the aggregate
Principal Amount advanced to date up to the stated maximum amount
at Maturity. The Company may request and the payee shall advance up
to $11,000 on the last day of each month until the note matures.
The Note may be convertible in whole or in part at a conversion
price of $0.25 per share into Amarillo Biosciences, Inc., Common
voting stock. All shares issued are to be restricted subject to
Rule 144 promulgated under the U.S. Securities Act of 1933. The
Company may prepay the Note in whole or in part at any time without
penalty.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">
_______________</font></font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-size: 70%; vertical-align: top; font-family: Times New Roman">
<a name="ref.bNGOD1">14</a></font> <font style="font-size: 13px">Applicable Federal Rate</font></font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-size: 70%; vertical-align: top; font-family: Times New Roman">
<a name="ref.QPGOD1">15</a></font> <font style="font-size: 13px">Applicable Federal Rate</font></font></div>
<div id="pgbrk" style="width: 100%; margin-left: 0px; text-indent: 0px; margin-right: 0px">
<div id="ftr">
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div id="pn" style="text-align: center"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">F-16</font></div>
</div>
<div id="pb" style="text-align: center; page-break-after: always; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 6px; width: 100%; height: 1px; background-color: #000000">
<!--page break--></div>
<div id="hdr">
<div style="text-align: left; width: 100%; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">On
January 1, 2021, the Company issued Note #9.21 to Dr. Chen which
reduced to writing the various working capital advances through
December 2020, and became the ongoing record to track future
working capital advances through the Note&#x2019;s maturity date of
April 14, 2021. The maximum aggregate value of Note #9.21 is
$325,000 and carries an AFR interest rate of 0.13%. The Company may
request in writing, as needed, an advance of funds, not to exceed
the specified maximum amount, and the payee shall advance the
requested amount until Maturity.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>

is a complete list of Convertible Notes Payable issued by the
Company as of December 31, 2020, and subsequent to that Balance
Sheet Date.</font></div>

<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">_______________<br>
</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-size: 70%; vertical-align: top; font-family: Times New Roman">
<a name="ref.CVGOD1">16</a></font> <font style="font-size: 13px">Interest on all Related Party notes is assessed
using the short-term or medium-term Applicable Federal Rate (AFR).
Applicable Federal Rate is-the</font><font style="color: #222222; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px; background-color: #FFFFFF">&#xA0;</font><font style="font-size: 13px">minimum
interest rate that the Internal Revenue Service (IRS) allows for
private loans. The IRS publishes a monthly set of
interest&#xA0;rates&#xA0;that the agency considers the minimum
market rate for loans, whereas, interest rates less than
the&#xA0;AFR&#xA0;would have tax implications.</font></font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><a name="ref.HXGOD1"><font style="font-size: 70%; vertical-align: top; font-family: Times New Roman">
17</font><font style="font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font>The balances in
this column represent the principal of the outstanding notes
payable. The principal balance of each note and accrued interest
through December 31, 2020, is as follows: (1) $119,221; (2)
$271,092; (3.19) $42,622; (4.19) $15,443; (5.19) $17,182; (6.20)
$224,120; (7.20) $24,014; (8.20a) $48,702; (8.20b) $85,937; (9)
$237,231; (10.21) $59,203; (11.21) $37,107.</a></font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-size: 70%; vertical-align: top; font-family: Times New Roman">
<a name="ref.cNHOD1">18</a></font> <font style="font-size: 13px">On November 30, 2020, the Company&#x2019;s Board
of Directors approved an extension of the consulting agreement and
pre-existing warrant certificate between the Company and i2China
Management Group, LLC, originally dated April 15, 2018.
Compensation stated in the updated agreement increased the monthly
retainer from $8,000 to $15,000 per month retroactive to January 1,
2020. The retainer increase was $7,000 per month and was
retroactively deferred and added to Convertible promissory note
#8.20. The retroactive retainer totaled $84,000 and was added to
the unpaid balance of the note, $48,000, bringing the total unpaid
balance as of December 31, 2020 to $132,000.</font></font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><a name="ref.TRHOD1"><font style="font-size: 70%; vertical-align: top; font-family: Times New Roman">
19</font> Note 8.20b is the retroactive retainer. The total
indebtedness for Note 8.20 (8.20a + 8.20b) is $132,000; including
the accrued interest, the total indebtedness is
$134,037.</a></font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-size: 70%; vertical-align: top; font-family: Times New Roman">
<a name="ref.TVHOD1">20</a></font> <font style="font-size: 13px">Dr. Chen loaned operating funds to the Company in
2020 on an open-ended basis. Note 9.21was issued in 2021. The note
is not convertible and interest will be accrued at the short-term
AFR rate.</font></font></div>

<div id="ftr">
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">

<DESCRIPTION>EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT BETWEEN COMPANY AND STEPHEN T. CHEN, PH.D. DATED 12/31/20 AND EFFECTIVE 01/01/21

<div style="text-align: right; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-weight: bold; color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">
Exhibit 10.1 (f)</font></div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: center; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #000000; font-weight: bold; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">
EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT</font></div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 48px">
<font style="color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">This
Agreement (the "Agreement") is effective as of the 1st day of
January 2021 (&#x201C;Effective Date&#x201D;) by and between, DR.
STEPHEN T. CHEN, Ph.D. (the "EMPLOYEE"), and AMARILLO BIOSCIENCES,
INC., a Texas Corporation ("EMPLOYER").</font></div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: center; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-weight: bold; color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">
RECITALS</font></div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 48px">
<font style="color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">WHEREAS,
the EMPLOYER is in need of assistance in the area of a CHAIRMAN,
PRESIDENT, CEO AND CFO; and</font></div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 48px">
<font style="color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">WHEREAS,
EMPLOYEE has agreed to perform work for the EMPLOYER;</font></div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 48px">
<font style="color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">NOW,
THEREFORE, the parties hereby agree as follows:</font></div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="display: table-cell; width: 48px"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #000000">1.</font>&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #000000">EMPLOYEE's
Services.</font><font style="color: #000000">&#xA0;EMPLOYEE shall
serve as a</font> <font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #000000">FULL-TIME, EXEMPT,
AT-WILL EMPLOYEE</font> <font style="color: #000000">and will work
from the EMPLOYER&#x2019;s office in Amarillo, Texas and/or at other
locations as directed by the EMPLOYER. EMPLOYEE shall be
responsible for complying and implementing the EMPLOYER&#x2019;s
programs, policies, and projects as summarized in</font>
<font style="font-weight: bold; color: #000000">Exhibit
&#x201C;A&#x201D;</font> <font style="color: #000000">of this
Agreement ("Scope of Work") and as may be otherwise needed and
requested by EMPLOYER. This contract is for the personal services
of the EMPLOYEE and shall not be assigned by the EMPLOYEE to any
other person or entity.</font></font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="display: table-cell; width: 48px"><font style="font-weight: bold; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="color: #000000">
2.</font>&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell"><font style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">
Consideration.</font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 48px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #000000">A.</font>&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;<font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #000000">EMPLOYEE
Salary.</font><font style="color: #000000">&#xA0;In consideration
of the Services to be performed by EMPLOYEE under this Agreement
the EMPLOYER will pay EMPLOYEE the following:</font></font></div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 48px">
<font style="color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">(i)
Monthly Salary: A monthly salary payable to EMPLOYEE in the amount
of $20,000, payable bi-monthly;</font></div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 48px">
<font style="color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">(ii)
Monthly Stock Grant: $8,333.33 per month payable in shares of
ABI&#x2019;s unregistered, voting common stock, such shares being
priced at the average of all trading day closing quotes on the
OTC-BB for the month preceding date of issuance and such shares to
be issued on February 1, 2021, March 1, 2021 and April 1, 2021 (or
as soon as thereafter practicable);</font></div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 48px">
<font style="color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">(iii)
EMPLOYEE benefits: Pursuant to the ABI employee benefits plan or
policy which may include hospital, surgical, medical, dental, group
life insurance or other benefits on terms at least as favorable as
those accorded to other employees of ABI, subject to insurability
and the execution of any agreement required therefor.</font></div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div id="pgbrk" style="width: 100%; margin-left: 0px; text-indent: 0px; margin-right: 0px">
<div id="ftr">
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 18px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="color: #333333; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">ABI
&#x2013; DR STEPHEN T. CHEN Ph.D. Employment Agreement &#x2013;
Effective January 1 2021</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 18px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="color: #333333; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">Initials:
EMPLOYER _________; EMPLOYEE __________</font></div>
</div>
<div id="pb" style="text-align: center; page-break-after: always; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 6px; width: 100%; height: 1px; background-color: #000000">
<!--page break--></div>
<div id="hdr">
<div style="text-align: left; width: 100%; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 48px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #000000">B.</font>&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;<font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #000000">Expenses.</font><font style="color: #000000">&#xA0;
Each year, and from time to time, the EMPLOYER will establish a
budget for operating its programs and EMPLOYEE shall be bound by
the purposes and amounts for any such budget decision. In the event
that EMPLOYEE expends her own funds for pre-approved and
reimbursable expenses, EMPLOYEE will submit for EMPLOYER&#x2019;s
review and pre-approval original receipts and a written
reimbursement request detailing reimbursable expenses. If the
EMPLOYER provides a credit or debit card any use of the same shall
be limited to the EMPLOYER&#x2019;s pre-approved budget and for
EMPLOYER business only. EMPLOYEE shall submit a monthly written
expense report including original receipts.</font></font></div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="display: table-cell; width: 48px"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #000000">3.</font>&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #000000">EMPLOYEE
Relationship.</font><font style="color: #000000">&#xA0;Nothing
contained herein or any document executed in connection herewith,
shall be construed to create a partnership or joint venture
relationship between the EMPLOYER and EMPLOYEE.</font></font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="display: table-cell; width: 48px"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #000000">4.</font>&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #000000">Term.</font><font style="color: #000000">&#xA0;This Agreement shall be effective for</font>
<font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #000000">three (3)
months</font> <font style="color: #000000">commencing</font>
<font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #000000">January 1,
2021</font> <font style="color: #000000">through</font>
<font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #000000">March 31,
2021</font><font style="color: #000000">. Either party may
terminate this Agreement upon the earlier of: (i)</font>
<font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #000000">ten (10)
days</font> <font style="color: #000000">prior written notice for
termination without cause and for the convenience of either party,
(ii)</font> <font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #000000">immediately</font>
<font style="color: #000000">if EMPLOYER terminates this Agreement
for cause which includes, but is not limited to, breach of any of
the agreements and covenants in this Agreement, acts of dishonesty,
malfeasance, misfeasance, negligence, or material
misrepresentation, or (iii) immediately upon written notice of the
date that EMPLOYEE retires.</font></font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="display: table-cell; width: 48px"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #000000">5.</font>&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #000000">Competent
Work.</font><font style="color: #000000">&#xA0;All work will be
done in a competent fashion and all services are subject to final
approval by an authorized representative of the EMPLOYER prior to
payment. In the event that the work-product or reports of EMPLOYEE
do not meet the standards and requirements of the EMPLOYER, the
EMPLOYER may issue a &#x201C;Stop Work Order&#x201D; and EMPLOYEE
shall cease any and all activity specified in such notice until
such time that the Parties agree to continue or terminate
EMPLOYEE&#x2019;s performance EMPLOYEE services.</font></font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="display: table-cell; width: 48px"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #000000">6.</font>&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #000000">Representations and
Warranties.</font><font style="color: #000000">&#xA0;The EMPLOYEE
will make no representations, warranties, or commitments that bind
the EMPLOYER without the consent of the Board of Directors of the
EMPLOYER. Furthermore,</font> <font style="color: #000000; background-color: #FFFFFF">U.S. law requires
companies to employ only individuals who may legally work in the
United States &#x2013; either U.S. citizens, or foreign citizens who
have the necessary authorization. EMPLOYEE represents that her
employment with the EMPLOYER is in compliance with U.S. law.
EMPLOYEE represents that all communications during the course of
hiring, including EMPLOYEE&#x2019;s resume / curriculum vitae and
references, are true and correct. Any breach of this section shall
be cause for immediate termination and cancellation of this
Agreement. The EMPLOYER is hereby authorized to verify, at any
time, any representation made by EMPLOYEE to induce the EMPLOYER to
enter into this Agreement.</font></font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="display: table-cell; width: 48px"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #000000">7.</font>&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #000000">No Waiver.</font><font style="color: #000000">&#xA0;Failure to invoke any right, condition, or
covenant in this Agreement by either Party shall not be deemed to
imply or constitute a waiver of any rights, condition, or covenant
and neither Party may rely on such failure.</font></font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>

(other than written reports and routine business communications)
shall be deemed effective when (a) personally delivered or
deposited, postage prepaid, in the first class mail of the United
States properly, (b) delivered by facsimile or electronic mail and
addressed to the appropriate party at the address set forth
below:</font></font></div>

<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="margin-left: 24px; display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 48px">
<font style="color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">1.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font style="color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">Executive

<div style="margin-left: 24px; display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">

and reportings</font></div>

<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font style="color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">Coordination
with EMPLOYER employees, consultants, accountants, auditors,
attorney(ies) and vendors</font></div>

<div style="margin-left: 24px; display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 48px">
<font style="color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">4.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font style="color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">Support
to EMPLOYER Board of Directors</font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>

<font style="color: #333333; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">ABI
&#x2013; DR STEPHEN T. CHEN Ph.D. Employment Agreement &#x2013;
Effective January 1 2021</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 18px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="color: #333333; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">Initials:
EMPLOYER _________; EMPLOYEE __________</font></div>

<div id="pb" style="text-align: center; page-break-after: always; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 6px; width: 100%; height: 1px; background-color: #000000">

<div id="hdr">
<div style="text-align: left; width: 100%; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: center; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-weight: bold; color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">
EXHIBIT &#x201C;B&#x201D;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: center; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #000000; font-weight: bold; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">
STANDARD TERMS AND CONDITIONS</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">
These Standard Terms and Conditions are made and incorporated by
this reference in the EMPLOYEE AGREEMENT (&#x201C;Agreement&#x201D;)
attached hereto.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="margin-left: 0px; display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 48px">
<font style="font-weight: bold; color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">
1.0</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">
PROTECTION OF EMPLOYER INFORMATION AND PROPERTY</font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="margin-left: 48px; display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 48px">
<font style="color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">1.1</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #000000">Trade
Secrets</font><font style="color: #000000">. EMPLOYEE hereby agrees
and covenants not to disclose to third-parties or otherwise use to
the detriment of EMPLOYER any of the EMPLOYER&#x2019;s data, forms,
processes, procedures, business plans or information, and methods
of operation whether or not marked &#x201C;confidential&#x201D; or
&#x201C;trade secret&#x201D;, and all of the foregoing is agreed to
treated as confidential and trade secrets of EMPLOYER by
EMPLOYEE.</font></font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="margin-left: 48px; display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 48px">
<font style="color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">1.2</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #000000">Intellectual
Property</font><font style="color: #000000">. EMPLOYEE shall
immediately cease and desist using any of EMPLOYER&#x2019;s trade
name, trade and service marks, and any other intellectual or
intangible property (whether or not registered) upon termination of
this Agreement. Any original works, as that term is defined under
the U.S. Copyright laws, that are created by EMPLOYEE in the
performance of this Agreement is agreed to be a &#x201C;work made
for hire&#x201D; and shall vest ownership to EMPLOYER upon creation.
Any other intellectual property created by EMPLOYEE that is not
subject to the copyright laws, are made by EMPLOYEE for the
exclusive benefit of EMPLOYER and EMPLOYEE hereby grants to the
EMPLOYER an irrevocable, exclusive, unlimited, and royalty-free
license to EMPLOYER for such works.</font></font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="margin-left: 48px; display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 48px">
<font style="color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">1.3</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #000000">Use of Trade
Equipment</font><font style="color: #000000">. EMPLOYEE agrees and
covenants that its use of EMPLOYER&#x2019;s trade equipment,
inclusive of EMPLOYER&#x2019;s information technology, computer, and
communications systems, is for the exclusive benefit and purpose of
further EMPLOYER&#x2019;s business. EMPLOYEE further agrees that any
personal use of EMPLOYER&#x2019;s trade equipment is not
permitted.</font></font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="margin-left: 0px; display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 48px">
<font style="font-weight: bold; color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">
2.0</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">
EMPLOYEE&#x2019;S DUTIES UPON TERMINATION.</font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="margin-left: 48px; display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 48px">
<font style="color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">2.1</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #000000">Return of EMPLOYER
Property</font><font style="color: #000000">. Upon termination,
EMPLOYEE shall immediately return to EMPLOYER any and all data,
information, computer records and data, business records and files,
and any other document, record, trade equipment, supplies, keys,
modes of access, or any other material that was furnished by or
work products (including digital photographs, data, worksheets,
draft and final work product versions) created for the EMPLOYER
during the term of the Agreement. All of the foregoing shall at all
times by conclusively owned by the EMPLOYER and shall be returned
and submitted to the EMPLOYER at the conclusion of each task or
sub-task assigned under the Agreement. No files, documents, or
other materials will be removed from the EMPLOYER office to perform
the scope of work under this Agreement.</font></font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div id="pgbrk" style="width: 100%; margin-left: 0px; text-indent: 0px; margin-right: 0px">
<div id="ftr">
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 18px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="color: #333333; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">ABI
&#x2013; DR STEPHEN T. CHEN Ph.D. Employment Agreement &#x2013;
Effective January 1 2021</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 18px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="color: #333333; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">Initials:
EMPLOYER _________; EMPLOYEE __________</font></div>
</div>
<div id="pb" style="text-align: center; page-break-after: always; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 6px; width: 100%; height: 1px; background-color: #000000">
<!--page break--></div>
<div id="hdr">
<div style="text-align: left; width: 100%; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="margin-left: 48px; display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 48px">
<font style="color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">2.2</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #000000">Termination of Right
of Access</font><font style="color: #000000">. Upon termination,
EMPLOYEE&#x2019;s right of access to EMPLOYER&#x2019;s information
technology, computer and communications systems, trade equipment,
business premises, records, files and any other property of
EMPLOYER shall be automatically terminated without further
notice.</font></font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="margin-left: 48px; display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 48px">
<font style="color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">2.3</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #000000">Transfer of Business
Assignments</font><font style="color: #000000">. EMPLOYEE agrees
that upon termination, EMPLOYER has the unlimited right to assign
any of EMPLOYEE&#x2019;s projects, assignments, or other matters (in
whole, or in part) to another person or entity as solely determined
by EMPLOYER. EMPLOYEE hereby understands and agrees that EMPLOYEE
does not have any property interest whatsoever in any of the
projects, assignment, business relationships, intangible and
tangible property, and any other matter made, created, or performed
during the term of this Agreement.</font></font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="margin-left: 0px; display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 48px">
<font style="font-weight: bold; color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">
3.0</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">
MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS.</font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="margin-left: 48px; display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 48px">
<font style="color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">3.1</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #000000">Exclusive and Binding
Arbitration</font><font style="color: #000000">.</font>
<font style="font-weight: bold; color: #000000">THE PARTIES AGREE
TO BINDING ARBITRATION AS THE EXCLUSIVE DISPUTE RESOLUTION FORUM TO
SETTLE AND RESOLVE ANY AND ALL DISPUTES ARISING FROM THE AGREEMENT
AND THE EMPLOYER-EMPLOYEE RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN THE PARTIES. IT IS
FURTHER AGREED THAT TEXAS LAW SHALL GOVERN THIS AGREEMENT
(IRRESPECTIVE OF ITS CONFLICT OF LAW RULES), AND THAT THE
JURISDICTION AND VENUE FOR BINDING ARBITRATION SHALL BE THE CITY OF
DALLAS, STATE OF TEXAS. THE PARTIES AGREE TO UTILIZE JAMS MEDIATION
AND ARBITRATION SERVICES TO SETTLE ALL DISPUTES. THE PARTIES
EXPRESSLY AGREE TO WAIVE THEIR RIGHTS TO A JURY
TRIAL.</font></font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="margin-left: 48px; display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 48px">
<font style="color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">3.2</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #000000">Injunctive and
Equitable Relief</font><font style="color: #000000">.
Notwithstanding Section 3.1, EMPLOYEE also agrees that any breach
by EMPLOYEE of Sections 1.0 and 2.0 of this Agreement, including
such sub-parts, would create irreparable and immediate harm to
EMPLOYER and as such EMPLOYEE consents to any injunctive or
equitable relief that may be available to
EMPLOYER.</font></font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="margin-left: 48px; display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 48px">
<font style="color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">3.3</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #000000">Attorney&#x2019;s Fees
and Costs</font><font style="color: #000000">. The prevailing party
under any dispute shall be entitled to its reasonable
attorney&#x2019;s fees and costs, including costs of investigation
of such dispute.</font></font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="margin-left: 48px; display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 48px">
<font style="color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">3.4</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #000000">Collection of
Claims</font><font style="color: #000000">. In the event that
EMPLOYEE adjudged the prevailing party in any action, EMPLOYEE
hereby agrees that her sole source to satisfy any judgment shall be
the operating checking account of the EMPLOYER. EMPLOYEE expressly
waives any rights to seek collection of any judgment against
EMPLOYER&#x2019;s intellectual property rights or
interests.</font></font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div id="pgbrk" style="width: 100%; margin-left: 0px; text-indent: 0px; margin-right: 0px">
<div id="ftr">
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 18px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="color: #333333; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">ABI
&#x2013; DR STEPHEN T. CHEN Ph.D. Employment Agreement &#x2013;
Effective January 1 2021</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 18px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="color: #333333; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">Initials:
EMPLOYER _________; EMPLOYEE __________</font></div>

<div id="hdr">
<div style="text-align: left; width: 100%; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="margin-left: 48px; display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 48px">
<font style="color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">3.5</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #000000">Survival</font><font style="color: #000000">.
This Agreement shall survive and inure to the benefit of the
successors, assigns, heirs, and/or estates of the
parties.</font></font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="margin-left: 48px; display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 48px">
<font style="color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">3.6</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #000000">Statute of
Limitations</font><font style="color: #000000">. Notwithstanding
any statutory or common-law rule to the contrary, the parties agree
that any right of action must be commenced within one (1) year of
the act, omission, event, or circumstance that gave rise to such
cause of action.</font></font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="margin-left: 48px; display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 48px">
<font style="font-weight: bold; color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">
</font><font style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px;">3.7</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #000000">Liquidated Damages;
Settlement, Release and Discharge of EMPLOYER</font><font style="color: #000000">. The parties agree that the extent and cost for
injury, damage, or other adverse impacts to EMPLOYEE under this
Agreement is difficult to determine and speculative. In the
interest of settling any claims against EMPLOYER expeditiously, the
EMPLOYER may elect to pay EMPLOYEE liquidate damages and terminate
this Agreement. EMPLOYEE hereby agrees to this liquidated damages
clause and shall settle, release and discharge EMPLOYER from any
and all liabilities upon EMPLOYER&#x2019;s payment. As such, the
parties expressly agree that the extent of EMPLOYER&#x2019;s
liability to EMPLOYEE for injury, damage, or other adverse impact,
whether incurred during the course of performance of this Agreement
or arising from wrongful termination or other breach of this
Agreement by EMPLOYER shall be (2) months Salary. These provisions
and waiver shall apply to any claims, whether known by EMPLOYEE,
and do include an express waiver of any reservation of rights under
Section 1542 of the California Civil Code which reads as
follows:</font> <font style="font-weight: bold; color: #000000">&#x201C;A GENERAL RELEASE DOES
NOT EXTEND TO CLAIMS WHICH THE CREDITOR DOES NOT KNOW OR SUSPECT TO
EXIST IN HER FAVOR AT THE TIME OF EXECUTING THE RELEASE, WHICH IF
KNOW BY HIM MUCH HAVE MATERIALLY AFFECTED HER SETTLEMENT WITH THE
DEBTOR.&#x201D;</font></font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="margin-left: 48px; display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 48px">
<font style="color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">3.8</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #000000">Pro-rated Salary and
Medical Contribution</font><font style="color: #000000">. In the
event this Agreement is terminated prior to the expiration of the
Term, any salary, stock grants, benefits, and/or medical
contribution payments due EMPLOYEE shall be equitably adjusted and
pro-rated.</font></font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div id="pgbrk" style="width: 100%; margin-left: 0px; text-indent: 0px; margin-right: 0px">
<div id="ftr">
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>

AMENDMENT NO. 1</font></div>

TO</font></div>

EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 36px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">THIS
AMENDMENT NO. 1 is made by and between <font style="font-weight: bold; text-decoration: underline; font-family: Times New Roman">
AMARILLO BIOSCIENCES, INC.</font><font style="font-family: Times New Roman">, a Texas corporation, inclusive of
any Affiliates or subsidiaries (&#x201C;</font><font style="text-decoration: underline; font-family: Times New Roman">ABI</font><font style="font-family: Times New Roman">&#x201D;)
and</font> <font style="font-weight: bold; text-decoration: underline; font-family: Times New Roman">
STEPHEN T. CHEN, Ph.D.</font> <font style="font-family: Times New Roman">(&#x201C;EMPLOYEE&#x201D;)</font> to
that certain Employment Agreement between the parties made
effective January 1, 2021 (&#x201C;Agreement&#x201D;).</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="margin-left: 24px; display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 48px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">1.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">All references to
&#x201C;Chairman, President, CEO, and CFO&#x201D; shall be deleted
and be replaced by &#x201C;Senior Scientific Advisor&#x201D; for the
purposes of Employee&#x2019;s employment only. For the avoidance of
doubt, the deletion of the herein references shall not constitute a
resignation or removal of any officer position that Employee may
hold now or in the future.</font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="margin-left: 24px; display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 48px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">2.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">Notwithstanding the
foregoing paragraph 1, Employee may serve in any capacity as an
officer of ABI as determined by ABI&#x2019;s Board of Directors and
Article III of ABI&#x2019;s Bylaws.</font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>

conditions under the Agreement not expressly amended or modified by
this amendment shall continue in full force and
effect.</font></div>
</div>

WITNESS WHEREOF, each of the parties has caused this Agreement to

and year first above written.</font></div>

<SEQUENCE>4
<FILENAME>amar_ex101h.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT BETWEEN COMPANY AND BERNARD COHEN DATED 12/31/20 AND EFFECTIVE 01/01/21
<TEXT>
<html>
<head>
<!-- Document created using Blueprint(R) - powered by Issuer Direct - www.issuerdirect.com -->
<!-- Copyright 2021 Issuer Direct Corporation -->
<title>amar_ex101h</title>
</head>
<body style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px;">
<div id="pgbrk" style="width: 100%; margin-left: 0px; text-indent: 0px; margin-right: 0px">
<div id="hdr">
<div style="text-align: left; width: 100%; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="text-align: right; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-weight: bold; color: #333333; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">
Exhibit 10.1(h)</font></div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: center; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #333333; font-weight: bold; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">
EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT</font></div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 48px">
<font style="color: #333333; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">This
Agreement (the "Agreement") is effective as of the 1st day of
January 2021 (&#x201C;Effective Date&#x201D;) by and between, BERNARD
COHEN (the "EMPLOYEE"), and AMARILLO BIOSCIENCES, INC., a Texas
Corporation ("EMPLOYER").</font></div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: center; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-weight: bold; color: #333333; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">
RECITALS</font></div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 48px">
<font style="color: #333333; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">WHEREAS,
the EMPLOYER is in need of assistance in the area of a VICE
PRESIDENT - ADMINISTRATION; and</font></div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 48px">
<font style="color: #333333; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">WHEREAS,
EMPLOYEE has agreed to perform work for the EMPLOYER;</font></div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 48px">
<font style="color: #333333; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">NOW,
THEREFORE, the parties hereby agree as follows:</font></div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="display: table-cell; width: 48px"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #333333">1.</font>&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #333333">EMPLOYEE's
Services.</font><font style="color: #333333">&#xA0;EMPLOYEE shall
serve as a</font> <font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #333333">FULL-TIME, EXEMPT,
AT-WILL EMPLOYEE</font> <font style="color: #333333">and will work
from the EMPLOYER&#x2019;s office in Amarillo, Texas and/or at other
locations as directed by the EMPLOYER. EMPLOYEE shall be
responsible for complying and implementing the EMPLOYER&#x2019;s
programs, policies, and projects as summarized in</font>
<font style="font-weight: bold; color: #333333">Exhibit
&#x201C;A&#x201D;</font> <font style="color: #333333">of this
Agreement ("Scope of Work") and as may be otherwise needed and
requested by EMPLOYER. This contract is for the personal services
of the EMPLOYEE and shall not be assigned by the EMPLOYEE to any
other person or entity.</font></font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="display: table-cell; width: 48px"><font style="font-weight: bold; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="color: #333333">
2.</font>&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell"><font style="color: #333333; font-weight: bold; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">
Consideration.</font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 48px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #333333">A.</font>&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;<font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #333333">EMPLOYEE
Salary.</font><font style="color: #333333">&#xA0;In consideration
of the Services to be performed by EMPLOYEE under this Agreement
the EMPLOYER will pay EMPLOYEE the following:</font></font></div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 48px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">(i)
Monthly Salary: A monthly salary payable to EMPLOYEE in the amount
of $5,833.33, payable bi-monthly;</font></div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 48px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">(ii)
Monthly Stock Grant: $1,000 per month payable in shares of
ABI&#x2019;s unregistered, voting common stock, such shares being
priced at the average of all trading day closing quotes on the
OTC-BB for the month preceding date of issuance and such shares to
be issued on February 1, 2021, March 1, 2021 and April 1, 2021 (or
as soon as thereafter practicable);</font></div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 48px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">(iii)
EMPLOYEE benefits: Pursuant to the ABI employee benefits plan or
policy which may include hospital, surgical, medical, dental, group
life insurance or other benefits on terms at least as favorable as
those accorded to other employees of ABI, subject to insurability
and the execution of any agreement required therefor.</font></div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 48px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #333333">B.</font>&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;<font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #333333">Expenses.</font><font style="color: #333333">&#xA0;
Each year, and from time to time, the EMPLOYER will establish a
budget for operating its programs and EMPLOYEE shall be bound by
the purposes and amounts for any such budget decision. In the event
that EMPLOYEE expends her own funds for pre-approved and
reimbursable expenses, EMPLOYEE will submit for EMPLOYER&#x2019;s
review and pre-approval original receipts and a written
reimbursement request detailing reimbursable expenses. If the
EMPLOYER provides a credit or debit card any use of the same shall
be limited to the EMPLOYER&#x2019;s pre-approved budget and for
EMPLOYER business only. EMPLOYEE shall submit a monthly written
expense report including original receipts.</font></font></div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>

&#x2013; BERNARD COHEN Employment Agreement &#x2013; Effective

<div style="display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="display: table-cell; width: 48px"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #333333">3.</font>&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #333333">EMPLOYEE
Relationship.</font><font style="color: #333333">&#xA0;Nothing
contained herein or any document executed in connection herewith,
shall be construed to create a partnership or joint venture
relationship between the EMPLOYER and EMPLOYEE.</font></font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="display: table-cell; width: 48px"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #333333">4.</font>&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #333333">Term.</font><font style="color: #333333">&#xA0;This Agreement shall be effective for</font>
<font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #333333">three (3)
months</font> <font style="color: #333333">commencing</font>
<font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #333333">January 1,
2021</font> <font style="color: #333333">through</font>
<font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #333333">March 31,
2021</font><font style="color: #333333">. Either party may
terminate this Agreement upon the earlier of: (i)</font>
<font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #333333">ten (10)
days</font> <font style="color: #333333">prior written notice for
termination without cause and for the convenience of either party,
(ii)</font> <font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #333333">immediately</font>
<font style="color: #333333">if EMPLOYER terminates this Agreement
for cause which includes, but is not limited to, breach of any of
the agreements and covenants in this Agreement, acts of dishonesty,
malfeasance, misfeasance, negligence, or material
misrepresentation, or (iii)</font> <font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #333333">immediately</font>
<font style="color: #333333">upon written notice of the date that
EMPLOYEE retires.</font></font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="display: table-cell; width: 48px"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #333333">5.</font>&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #333333">Competent
Work.</font><font style="color: #333333">&#xA0;All work will be
done in a competent fashion and all services are subject to final
approval by an authorized representative of the EMPLOYER prior to
payment. In the event that the work-product or reports of EMPLOYEE
do not meet the standards and requirements of the EMPLOYER, the
EMPLOYER may issue a &#x201C;Stop Work Order&#x201D; and EMPLOYEE
shall cease any and all activity specified in such notice until
such time that the Parties agree to continue or terminate
EMPLOYEE&#x2019;s performance EMPLOYEE services.</font></font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="display: table">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="display: table-cell; width: 48px"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #333333">6.</font>&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #333333">Representations and
Warranties.</font><font style="color: #333333">&#xA0;The EMPLOYEE
will make no representations, warranties, or commitments that bind
the EMPLOYER without the consent of the Board of Directors of the
EMPLOYER. Furthermore,</font> <font style="color: #252525; background-color: #FFFFFF">U.S. law requires
companies to employ only individuals who may legally work in the
United States &#x2013; either U.S. citizens, or foreign citizens who
have the necessary authorization. EMPLOYEE represents that her
employment with the EMPLOYER is in compliance with U.S. law.
EMPLOYEE represents that all communications during the course of
hiring, including EMPLOYEE&#x2019;s resume / curriculum vitae and
references, are true and correct. Any breach of this section shall
be cause for immediate termination and cancellation of this
Agreement. The EMPLOYER is hereby authorized to verify, at any
time, any representation made by EMPLOYEE to induce the EMPLOYER to
enter into this Agreement.</font></font></div>
</div>

<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #333333">No Waiver.</font><font style="color: #333333">&#xA0;Failure to invoke any right, condition, or
covenant in this Agreement by either Party shall not be deemed to
imply or constitute a waiver of any rights, condition, or covenant
and neither Party may rely on such failure.</font></font></div>

<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell; margin-left: 0px; text-indent: 0px; margin-right: 0px;"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #333333">Entire Agreement and

<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="display: table;">
<div style="display: table-row;">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 48px;">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #333333">13.</font></font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell; margin-left: 0px; text-indent: 0px; margin-right: 0px;"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #333333">Binding Effect,
Assignment.</font><font style="color: #333333">&#xA0;This Agreement
shall be binding upon and shall inure to the benefit of EMPLOYEE
and the EMPLOYER and to the extent applicable each Party&#x2019;s
heirs, successors and assigns. Assignment of any right or
obligation under this Agreement is expressly prohibited without the
prior written consent of both Parties.</font></font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; text-indent: 0px; margin-right: 0px;"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 10">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="display: table;">
<div style="display: table-row;">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 48px;">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #333333">14.</font></font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell; margin-left: 0px; text-indent: 0px; margin-right: 0px;"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px"><font style="font-weight: bold; color: #333333">Governing Law,
Severability.</font><font style="color: #333333">&#xA0;This
Agreement shall be governed by the laws of the State of Texas,
irrespective of its Choice of Law rules. The invalidity or
unenforceability of any provision of this Agreement shall not
affect the validity or enforceability of any other
provision.</font></font></div>
</div>

EXHIBIT &#x201C;A&#x201D;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 0px">
